author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add the remaining two xml files to complete the v17 definition of HGCal

#### PR validation:

With 2 additional PR's #37897 and #37898 use the runTheMatrix test workflows for Phase2 geometry

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx312C Add two more xml files to complete the v17 definition of HGCal
